title: Circle Area Rounded Down
description:
Mr. Dengklek has just been appointed Circle Expert in Toki Village. He was asked by the residents to calculate the area of their perfectly circular garden. Given a radius $r$, calculate the area using $\pi = 3.14$. ### FORMAT INPUT First line contains an integer or a float $r$ ($0 \le r \le 10^5$). ### FORMAT OUTPUT First row contains one integer that represents the area of the circle. ### EXAMPLE INPUT/OUTPUT
Input
10
Output
314
Input
5
Output
78
Input
2.5
Output
19
template:

line = sys.stdin.read()
if line:
